Subject: The Sunday Morning Linux Review
Description: The Sunday Morning Linux Review is a podcast hosted by Tony Bemus, Tom Lawrence, Phil Porada, Jay LaCroix, and Mary Tomich. We talk about Linux, Open Source, and Security topics. We have been recording Live at Penguicon since 2012.  Speakers include:Tom Lawrence, Jay LaCroix, Tony Bemus, Phil Porada, Mary Tomich - Track: Tech  - Duration: 2 hours

Subject: DDOSs and What the Average Person Can Do About It
Description: DDOSs have been in the news for a few years. Learn what a DDOS is, how companies protect themselves, and how the average person can do their part to prevent it.  Speakers include:Tony Bemus - Track: Tech  - Duration: 1 hour
